content: WILMINGTON  Del. A Delaware court ruled in favor of truck stop operator TravelCenters of America LLC  on Monday in its lawsuit against the Comdata unit of FleetCor Technologies Inc  over merchant fees it paid to the fuel card provider.
name: FleetCor Technologies Inc
title: TravelCenters of America wins lawsuit vs. Comdata over merchant fees

content: WILMINGTON  Del.  Sept 11 A Delaware court ruled in favor of truck stop operator TravelCenters of America LLC on Monday in its lawsuit against the Comdata unit of FleetCor Technologies Inc over merchant fees it paid to the fuel card provider.
name: FleetCor Technologies Inc
title: UPDATE 1-TravelCenters of America wins lawsuit vs Comdata over merchant fees

content: SAO PAULO FleetCor Technologies Inc agreed on Tuesday to buy Brazil's largest electronic toll payments firm for 4.086 billion reais ($1.1 billion)  underscoring the growing allure of Latin America's biggest fleet management market in spite of a steep recession.
name: FleetCor Technologies Inc
title: FleetCor pays $1.1 billion for Brazil toll payment firm Sem Parar

content: SAO PAULO  March 15 FleetCor Technologies Inc agreed on Tuesday to buy Brazil's largest electronic toll payments firm for 4.086 billion reais ($1.1 billion)  underscoring the growing allure of Latin America's biggest fleet management market in spite of a steep recession.
name: FleetCor Technologies Inc
title: UPDATE 2-FleetCor pays $1.1 bln for Brazil toll payment firm Sem Parar

content: * Fleetcor to acquire STP  a leading electronic toll payment company
name: FleetCor Technologies Inc
title: BRIEF-Fleetcor to buy Brazil's STP for about $1.05 bln

content: BRASILIA  March 15 U.S. group FleetCor Technologies Inc. agreed to buy Brazil's largest electronic toll road payment company Sem Parar for 4.086 billion reais ($1.12 billion) through a local subsidiary  one of Sem Parar's shareholders said on Tuesday.
name: FleetCor Technologies Inc
title: U.S. FleetCor to buy Brazil's Sem Parar for $1.12 bln  CCR says

content: SAO PAULO  Jan 18 U.S. group FleetCor is in talks to buy Brazil's largest electronic toll payment company Sem Parar  in a deal that could be valued at 4 billion reais ($1 billion) if confirmed  the local Estado de S. Paulo newspaper said on Monday.
name: FleetCor Technologies Inc
title: US FleetCor may buy Brazil's Sem Parar - paper
